questions.question: Which command is used to initialize a new Git repository?
What does 'git clone' do?
options: Creates a copy of a remote repository
questions.answer: Creates a copy of a remote repository

questions.question: Which command shows the current status of your Git repository?
What is a pull request in GitHub?
options: A request to merge changes from one branch to another
A request to create a new repository
A request to delete a branch
questions.answer: A request to merge changes from one branch to another
